meanings.sent1: He is the laddier of the two brothers.

meanings.sent3: The laddier hat looked comical on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as laddier as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The laddier colors of the sunset painted the sky beautifully.

meanings.sent1: She had a laddier attitude than her sister.

meanings.sent3: The laddier behavior of the cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as laddier as a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The laddier charm of the small town was enchanting.

meanings.sent1: The laddier pattern on the wall was intriguing.
meanings.sent2: The plant grew in a laddier shape than expected.
meanings.sent3: The laddier design of the bookshelf was unique.
meanings.sent4: Her hair cascaded down her back like a laddier.
